website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent alternative for those who have a difficult time swallowing pills, especially when supplements can be quite large. Contains some necessary B vitamins in 100% RDA.
pros: One-ounce dropper contains B2, B3, B5, B6, and B12
Convenient if you can't swallow pills - just drop liquid under tongue and wait before swallowing
Maintains nervous system health and supports metabolism
Users say it works fast and has a pleasant flavor
cons: Does not contain all B vitamins
A few reports of not feeling any difference after taking

customer_reviews.title: Best B-12 supplement for the price
customer_reviews.text: My physician recommended a good B-12 supplement, and said I should get a liquid supplement. This one not only supplies B-12, but other essential B vitamins as well. Plus, it's also the most affordable supplement of it's kind I could find, after researching numerous other products. Since the first order, I'm sticking with this particular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vitamin with fast absorption!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. I have bought so many of it. I have given some away to friends that complain of low energy. It works like magic for me when I have itchy throat - kaboom! No more coughing. My doctor recommends I take it in the morning after breakfast. Hope this helps someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Uche

customer_reviews.title: Regular repeat users
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I regularly use this product. She is a bariatric surgery patient and is required to take sub-lingual B-Complex. Since she began taking it, I do too! It has a pleasant taste and gets into your system fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: The real problem is that you have to do this every 6 hours!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do you have to do this every 6 hours, you have to hold it under your tongue for 30 seconds. I don't feel that it's worth it! I'd rather take a caplet and be done.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Luizza

customer_reviews.title: Always Tell When I Use It
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and I can always tell when I've used it. I just feel better. The taste isn't bad but it's not as good as other brands. Overall this is absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: dfl

customer_reviews.title: "Easily Absorbed"
customer_reviews.text: This complex is easily absorbed, and doesn't taste that bad to me. It goes under the tongue, and you hold it there for about 30 seconds, and then swallow. I did notice a slight more energy within about three days - I have steroid induced diabetes. I am satisfied with this product, and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: "Miracle"

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like this system... It's so simple and has a good amount of the b's
customer_reviews.author: Hoolihan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste bad, and gives me a boost in the afternoon
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste bad, and gives me a boost in the afternoon. Use this in my raw/mix dogfood also. Dogs don't seem to mind the semi-sweet taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Livingood

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very weak. Didn't help at all. Ended up going back to the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Love Jones-J

customer_reviews.title: No gluten or other allergens
customer_reviews.text: Very pure product. Puritans Pride always gives good value for the money. Tastes better than most, too. You can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping that my children would take it. I disagree with the reviews that said it tastes good
customer_reviews.author: anthony weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great B!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great liquid B complex and fits in my purse for a boost of b when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: as advertised good product brand
customer_reviews.text: I like the puritan pride products especially the B complex sublingual. I use it 1st thing in the morning for energy. I wish they came in a larger oz bottle it goes pretty quick. I would recommend it for sure
customer_reviews.author: phil g.

customer_reviews.title: Not actually b12 complex
customer_reviews.text: It's not it B12 full B-Complex as advertised. Very disappointed. Missing lots of important b vits.
customer_reviews.author: POLLY

customer_reviews.title: BEEN TAKING 10 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: IT IS EASY TO TAKE. TASTES GOOD. AND IT WORKS
customer_reviews.author: Don Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Taking a vitamin has never been so easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and how taking vitamins has never been so easy. I am not aware of any physical changes but maybe it is all happening under the curtain,-)
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Olive

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives you a good boost of energy plus some nice health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: J2DAZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick and very easy way to supplement B vitamins for a raw fed dog.
customer_reviews.author: Aand

customer_reviews.text: Caution: Does not contain the 'bioavailable' form of B12!!! Do your homework people.
customer_reviews.author: tiprtst

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first bottle and I love this supplement. It tastes much better then most liquid b vitamins and my energy levels are always high. Definitely ordering my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya N. Hall

product_meta.title: Puritan's Pride Liquid Vitamin B Complex Sublingual with Vitamin B-12-2 fl oz Liquid
product_meta.description: This Vitamin B-Complex Sublingual Liquid with Vitamin B-12 provides an excellent source of B-Complex vitamins to help safeguard a sufficient daily intake. The B-Complex is essential for the maintenance of healthy nervous tissue.** The B Vitamins play a role in energy metabolism in the body.** There are 59 doses per 2 fl. oz. ** These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: We are the manufacturer and the only authorized seller of this product.
This product has been made with the highest quality ingredients available.
Over 40 years in business and 19 million customers served.
Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.
Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.
